name: Adipo City Visual Novel Chapter 2: The Clock Says Eureka, Midori!
name_original: Adipo City Visual Novel Chapter 2: The Clock Says Eureka, Midori!
description:
HEY!

It's chapter two of the big Adipo City finale visual novel thing.

This part uhh took a long time :)

And it is also VERY big!!!

Just like the women, they're very big too.  

I hope you  enjoy!
